title: Historian on home and work - effect

content.question: The growing number of women in the workforce in the second half of the twentieth century most directly contributed to

choices.label: the widespread belief that women's roles in the home should be abandoned entirely
the ratification of a constitutional amendment guaranteeing women's equality
legislation that restricted women's paid work to certain occupations
increased social anxieties about the decline of the traditional nuclear family

content.answer: increased social anxieties about the decline of the traditional nuclear family

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
